summary: An accomplished developer with 8+ years experience building solutions, augmenting technical teams, and consulting for clients ranging from early-stage startups to established enterprises

experience.title: Senior Full-Stack Mobile/Web Developer
experience.description: Worked with a diverse set of multi-national clients of all sizes on a variety of web/mobile apps, notable examples include:

projects.name: Kaotim
projects.client: Digital insurance platform for Malaysia's 2nd largest insurance provider
projects.description: As the lead mobile developer, developed the app counterpart for their online insurance platform - while simultaneously providing support for the web-based version where required. Took initiative to establish best practices in both the codebase and project management processes

projects.name: RHB Bank
projects.description: Aided in the development and launch of their new internet banking platform, while providing leadership and mentorship for their in-house developers. Alongside development of new features, spearheaded the process of refactoring out-dated legacy code to improve the site's stability and scalability

projects.name: BonusLink
projects.description: Assisted in the development of their redesigned website, which significantly increased customer interactions post-launch, according to user analytics. To facilitate multiple partnered promotional sites, the app was created as a monorepo (via Turborepo)

projects.name: Wimyx
projects.description: Launched the first iteration of their app which allowed users to record videos of concerts, and seamlessly switch between enhanced and regular audio tracks during playback. FFMPEG was heavily utilised for many features on this project, and live streaming was briefly implemented as a proof-of-concept for future iterations

projects.name: Homeboxx
projects.description: Headed the development of their partner mobile app, which was used to remotely activate secure lockboxes. Stepped up to implement OTP generation and SMS integration when the back-end team was preoccupied

projects.name: Top Glove
projects.description: Created a super-app for workforce management with GPS/bluetooth location based task distribution, voice calling, and instant messaging. The bluetooth tracking was achieved using beacons which could ping off devices to provide estimated distances

projects.name: Oslo Mikrobuldring
projects.description: As a full-stack developer, integrated the Stripe payment gateway with subscription-based models to their mobile app

experience.title: Technical Consultant
experience.description: Deployed and maintained enterprise e-learning solutions
highlights: Worked with many large businesses including DBS Bank, Allianz, & Great Eastern Life

personalProjects.title: Team Q Swim
personalProjects.companyDescription: Booking management system for a local swim school
personalProjects.description: Single handedly developed full-stack with React Native and the AWS suite (DynamoDB as database).
highlights: Built comprehensive booking management system with attendance tracking
Implemented user profile management with role-based access control

personalProjects.title: ShapeLink
personalProjects.description: As a passion project and learning experience, designed and developed a mobile puzzle game using Unity and C# scripting.
highlights: Published to both App Store and Google Play Store with positive user reviews
Implemented in-app purchases and advertisements for monetization
